metadata.title: CVE-2019-11578 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
auth.c in dhcpcd before 7.2.1 allowed attackers to infer secrets by performing latency attacks.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-11578` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dhcpcd5 - 7.1.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dhcpcd5 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.1.0-2').
